quote.msg: According to Sky Germany, Aubameyang is on his way to London on a private jet. The plane took off at 12:31 pm UK time.

replies.msg:
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has left Dortmund Airport in a private jet heading for London, Sky Sports News understands.

Arsenal have agreed a deal worth around £60m with Borussia Dortmund for the 28-year-old striker, who is expected to arrive at the Gunners' training ground on Tuesday afternoon.

While Dortmund have agreed a fee, Sky sources understand they will not let Aubameyang go until they find a replacement.

Olivier Giroud, Michy Batshuayi and Anthony Modeste are among the names being considered by Dortmund, who are looking to secure a signing before the Bundesliga transfer window closes at 5pm on Wednesday.

Dont J la BBC clear things up

Aubameyang can have Arsenal medical
#bbcfootball or text 81111 (UK only)

Simon Stone
BBC Sport
Borussia Dortmund have cleared Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to have a medical at Arsenal but the deal is still not done.

The German transfer window closes at 1700 GMT tomorrow.

However, for transfers to a German club from overseas, that only applies to lodging contracts with the DFL.

The actual registration is done via Fifa and they have until 2300 GMT to complete that, so, in theory, a contract could be lodged for a transfer that never actually goes through.
